Meet the Author and Illustrator,
Hardi Shukla


A computer engineer-turned-illustrator, she never let go of her love for drawing and continued to hone her skills. With her engineering background, she brings a technical eye to her illustrations, infusing them with a sense of precision and accuracy.

Her cultural roots in Gujarat also play a significant role in her work. It is reflected in her work in the form of traditional motifs and style.

Hardi regularly collaborates with a wide range of clients across the globe to provide illustration, book cover design, STEM-illustrations, comic design and animation services.
